name: Disconnected (Sílvia Cavadas)
description:
Made for the 2021 #FemDevsMeetup game jam with theme "Connection".

There's a bubble of emptiness around you and you need to keep scrolling that feed. But that annoying hotspot keeps moving. Move close to the hotspot to keep your internet connection. Don't forget to eat sometimes too.

Sometimes you wonder, is there something else? Does connection go beyond a scrolling feed?

Arrow keys or wasd to move.

Made with Unity.
